examples.sentence: Question marker - turns statements into questions

sections.heading: Core Functions
sections.content:
か has 3 main uses:

Question marker - turns statements into questions Choice - "or" between options Uncertainty - "whether/if" in embedded questions

sections.heading: 1. Question Marker
sections.content:
Add か to make yes/no questions:

学生ですか？ "Are you a student?" 行きますか？ "Will you go?" 美味しいですか？ "Is it delicious?"

children.heading: With Question Words
children.content: 何を食べますか？ - "What will you eat?" 誰が来ますか？ - "Who is coming?" どこに行きますか？ - "Where are you going?" いつ行きますか？ - "When will you go?"

sections.heading: 2. Choice (Or)
sections.content:
Between two or more options:

コーヒーか紅茶 "coffee or tea" 今日か明日 "today or tomorrow" 犬か猫か鳥 "dog, cat, or bird"

sections.heading: 3. Embedded Questions (Whether/If)
sections.content:
In indirect questions - か marks uncertainty:

誰が来るか分かりません "I don't know who's coming" どこに行くか教えてください "Please tell me where to go" 本当かどうか "whether it's true or not"

Pattern: [Question]か + [Verb]

sections.heading: Casual Speech
sections.content:
In casual conversation, か is often dropped:

Formal: 行きますか？ Casual: 行く？ "Will you go?"

Rising intonation indicates question.

sections.heading: かどうか Pattern
sections.content:
"Whether or not":

行くかどうか分からない "I don't know whether (I'll) go or not" 本当かどうか確認する "confirm whether it's true or not"

children.heading: In very polite/formal situations
children.content:
Use more formal endings:

Less formal: 行きますか More formal: 行かれますか Most formal: いらっしゃいますか

children.heading: After plain past (use の)
children.content: Awkward: 行ったか？ Better: 行ったの？(casual) Better: 行きましたか？(polite)

children.heading: Yes/No Question
children.content: [Statement] + か？ 学生ですか？ - "Are you a student?"

children.heading: Question Word Question
children.content: [Question word] + [Statement] + か？ 何を食べますか？ - "What will you eat?"

children.heading: Choice
children.content: [A]か[B] コーヒーか紅茶 - "coffee or tea"

children.heading: Embedded Question
children.content: [Question]か + [Verb] 誰が来るか知らない - "don't know who's coming"

sections.heading: Politeness Levels
sections.content: Most casual: 行く？(no か) Casual: 行くの？ Standard: 行きますか？ Polite: 行かれますか？

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ Question marker (statement + か) ✓ Choice between options ("or") ✓ Embedded questions ("whether") ✓ Often dropped in casual speech ✓ Rising intonation for questions
